> Each request me=
thod should map to one and only one action, each action

 and only one method, each method should mean the same
> thing for all reso=
urces controlled by the application.  This results in

f semantics for all resources" and avoids the

hich precluded caching, as per Fielding

The web is a global hyper=
text system. To my mind, it doesn=E2=80=99t seem to

nguish between =E2=80=9Cresources controlled by the
application=E2=80=9D an=
d other resources (presumably controlled by other
